properties.description: It is free to join and use the library and everyone is welcome. Alongside free access to books, computers, casual and study seating, the Library runs a host of free activities for adults and children including a Connect Over A Cuppa Coffee Morning every Monday 2.30pm-3.30pm, there is no charge for refreshments
